channel.title: Comments on: How fast can you stack cups?
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: In Kiriat Ata we used to play "Cops and Thieves". I guess it was a more relevant game for us over there :)
item.content:encoded: In Kiriat Ata we used to play “Cops and Thieves”. I guess it was a more relevant game for us over there :)

item.title: By: arielcohen
item.dc:creator: arielcohen
item.description: More important, the bug had to disappeared...
item.content:encoded: More important, the bug had to disappeared…

item.title: By: arielcohen
item.dc:creator: arielcohen
item.description: Cup flipping looks like an old game used to be played when I was at 7th grade - flipping mtach boxes. People used to play it in the Burger Ranch at 'merkaz hacarmel'.
item.content:encoded: Cup flipping looks like an old game used to be played when I was at 7th grade – flipping mtach boxes. People used to play it in the Burger Ranch at ‘merkaz hacarmel’.
